root.name: Yu-Gi-Oh! The Dawn of Destiny
root.description: OverviewYu-Gi-Oh! The Dawn of Destiny is a card battling game developed and published by Konami for the Xbox platform. Dawn of Destiny is the only entry in the entire franchise to be released on the Xbox.GameplayYu-Gi-Oh! The Dawn of Destiny contains more than one thousand Yu-Gi-Oh cards. Players have the choice to create up to three different decks to use. The gameplay is the same as the real life counterpart card game infused with 3D graphics for the monsters.Dawn of Destiny adds two new modes that were never before seen in a Yu-Gi-Oh game: Link Duel Mode and Triple Duel Mode.
